wordGroup: thriving and prosperous 繁荣昌盛

sentences.en: Dirty streets are no advertisement for a prosperous society.
sentences.cn: 肮脏的街道绝不是繁荣社会的景象。

sentences.en: Dirty streets and homelessness are no advertisement for a prosperous society.
sentences.cn: 肮脏的街道和无家可归现象绝不是繁荣社会的景象。

sentences.en: Barcelona has become one of the most dynamic and prosperous cities in the Mediterranean.
sentences.cn: 巴塞罗那已经成为地中海地区最具活力、最为繁荣的城市之一。
